content.question: An effective price floor placed on a market for a good will have which of the following effects on the quantity purchased by consumers and the consumer surplus?

choices.label: Quantity will decrease, and consumer surplus will increase
Quantity will decrease, and consumer surplus will decrease
Quantity will increase, and consumer surplus will not change
Quantity will increase, and consumer surplus will increase
Quantity will not change, and consumer surplus will decrease

content.answer: Quantity will decrease, and consumer surplus will decrease

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
